configFileTemplates.$CONFIG/NuGet/NuGet.Config:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<configuration>
    <packageSources>
        <clear/>
        {{ for repo in repos.nuget }}
        <add key="{{ repo.name | escape }}" value="{{ repo.url | escape }}" />
        {{ endfor }}
    </packageSources>
    
    <config>
        <add key="defaultPushSource" value="{{ repos.nuget_push_url }}" />
    </config>
</configuration>
